description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Shortcrust Pastry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweet Shortcrust Pastry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Turn pastry onto a lightly floured surface. Knead gently until smooth. Shape into a 2cmthick disc. Wrap in baking paper. Refrigerate for 20-30 minutes or until firm enough to roll out. Variation: To make chocolate shortcrust pastry, process 2 tbs premium cocoa powder with flour, sugar and butter, then add 1 egg and chilled water.
